name: FuegoParasito
description:
Hey,

this game is the result of a challenge me and some friends did: Develop a game for a Game Jam (in this case the Game Jam Jame Gam) within 11 hours. This is the result: FuegoParasito! You play as Camillo, who goes on an island full of parasites. Your only weapon is a candle, a real powerful candle! Survive as long as you can and enjoy the beautiful music while at it!
